name: Slime Alchemy
description:
Slime Alchemy is a short platformer made for the Slime Jam.

Use an ancient alchemical tool to give the Slime you create properties to aid in further exploration. There are three full levels to complete, and the abilities you choose affect the obstacles you face.

Playtime is 5-15 minutes.

Mouse to navigate the menus.
Arrow keys to control the Slime.

Your screen size should be MORE than 1024x768 to play this game. If your resolution is approximately equal to that, you may have trouble viewing the edges of the screen.

I'm planning to make some changes and add a lot of new levels in the very near future, so any feedback is appreciated! I want to expand this into a much larger game.

V1.0.2.
